ID: CO9MB5C_00
From: Internal News <ONE.Chalhoub@chalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2024-10-24 16:36
Subject: Creating Impact Together, Transform Chalhoub, Coffee with Andreu, Collaborate & Elevate Offsite, Just Landed: On & St. Regis Cairo X Givenchy
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/Ppj7B141jkGPW94DZOuc_g/544502/4C7433AD8F37E0FA9D7A0F760761734E/top-banner-eng.png> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/Ppj7B141jkGPW94DZOuc_g/544604/5F6BD61E8BBE1ECD17827C80FB2319F9/nuggets-03.png> 	

CREATING IMPACT TOGETHER

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/Ppj7B141jkGPW94DZOuc_g/550545/BD9FDC57636DDCD3714405DFF0C85A00/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-22.gif> 	
On 13th October, our Impact Leaders travelled from Sharjah and Dubai to Abu Dhabi, partnering with Emirates Red Crescent to support with packing aid to those affected by the Lebanon crisis.

The team worked tirelessly, packing and organising essential food supplies to aid those in need.

On 20th October, our team members came together at Dubai Expo 2020, partnering with Emirates Red Crescent and Dubai Cares to pack essential items for the people in Lebanon.

Thank you to all our volunteers for your commitment, generous contributions and ongoing support during these challenging times.

chunks.text:
Thank you to all our volunteers for your commitment, generous contributions and ongoing support during these challenging times.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/Ppj7B141jkGPW94DZOuc_g/550546/A78E2F9A6E2FB617C05B88DEE8A17450/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-23.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/Ppj7B141jkGPW94DZOuc_g/544518/EA5451AEC8C1A8A08E231DEEFE8086E5/nuggets-10.png> 	

ACQUIRE NEW SYSTEM EXPERTISE BY JOINING TRANSFORM CHALHOUB

Transform Chalhoub is set to revolutionize our operations by introducing innovative end-to-end business processes and state-of-the-art systems like SAP and Blue Yonder with dynamic opportunities for you to be part of it.

Hear from your colleagues who participated in previous transformations!

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/Ppj7B141jkGPW94DZOuc_g/550547/81A1CDB12DD366DE75F6EC155255716C/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-24.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/Ppj7B141jkGPW94DZOuc_g/549433/3313A052F911679EB07CAA448C355A00/untitled-design-55.png> 	

Discover the essentials of skincare with our brands’ workshops at The Skincare Edition: Unfiltered, in Riyadh from October 30th to November 3rd. Learn how to customise the perfect skincare routine for you and engage in a Q&A sessions to have all your skincare questions answered. Elevate your skincare game today! Don’t miss the opportunity to sign up for these insightful workshops <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fwww.hiahub.com%252fskincare.html%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWf68qPIDpf1N5oeMZCJ%252flQq0bYSO%252bzJl6Yp7b6sEhdDOOR2ctWUQmVBVj0leMXs5N78hJEveu9rQHGg2oEVs6udoj%252fGFIX2kYCQK97kLa%252b7KYIdCsuIBTstx5Sdyt1qi5xM3VS%252bMtLgek34Zeytpjxso1vryDnaWk%252b%252b%252fJsX8QN7W0prQEA14O6Gl2hFOMMIktePFmJluVUml3dNf92ieebj%252bWD251EoNZj4Ho0i1Mz36&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C17f0b985c67f4d24e0e408dcf42884a6%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638653702138808494%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=C8qLRAtx1stQPW%2BzQ%2Bm%2BoW1ASDCGJm%2F2FulYCou1isQ%3D&reserved=0> now!

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/Ppj7B141jkGPW94DZOuc_g/550549/E5CA61A4F81E860BE888E4ABF367042F/untitled-design-12.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/Ppj7B141jkGPW94DZOuc_g/549433/3313A052F911679EB07CAA448C355A00/untitled-design-55.png> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/Ppj7B141jkGPW94DZOuc_g/545534/971D229AB473B630B6C23CC910C456D4/nuggets-40.png> 	

COFFEE WITH ANDREU

Last week, team members from different verticals in the UAE connected with Andreu Marco, Chief Operating Officer, over coffee, where they engaged in meaningful conversations, shared experiences, and networked in an open setting.

chunks.text:
different verticals in the UAE connected with Andreu Marco, Chief Operating Officer, over coffee, where they engaged in meaningful conversations, shared experiences, and networked in an open setting. Look out for future opportunities to meet our leaders!

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/Ppj7B141jkGPW94DZOuc_g/550550/50DB377BAEAD309C19DF0B4464B8E961/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-25.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/Ppj7B141jkGPW94DZOuc_g/545211/5FDAD611705DA32196E5920C94611DB0/nuggets-22.png> 	

COLLABORATE & ELEVATE OFFSITE WITH RSO AND ADMIN

Our RSO and Admin teams recently attended the 'Collaborate and Elevate' offsite, fostering open discussions and sharing experiences to strengthen collaboration. Embracing change, they built deeper connections and developed a best ways of working, paving the way for more effective teamwork.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/Ppj7B141jkGPW94DZOuc_g/550540/17ED3DA421CCFE162A9FC8B185F36254/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-6.png> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/Ppj7B141jkGPW94DZOuc_g/544531/52D6CD8730A78EDF58F9DC0B5DB4E090/nuggets-46.png> 	

JUST LANDED: ON 

On—the perfect blend of cutting-edge technology and sleek design for your active lifestyle is officially available at Tryano store, Abu Dhabi. With their signature CloudTec® cushioning, On shoes deliver an ultra-light, responsive feel that propels you forward. It's time to elevate your performance and style with footwear that feels as good as it looks.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/Ppj7B141jkGPW94DZOuc_g/550548/79A0CD1B137EE4181D5E9102AE7CB761/try_on.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/Ppj7B141jkGPW94DZOuc_g/545541/F8DE55BDC1E433E944FF399F0430DAFB/nuggets-49.png>

ST. REGIS CAIRO X GIVENCHY: A NIGHT OF ICONIC FASHION


In an exclusive collaboration, St. Regis Cairo and Givenchy hosted Egypt’s first-ever Givenchy event. 

This landmark event celebrated luxury and style, marking a historic debut for Givenchy in Egypt. A night where fashion, culture and elegance converged.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/Ppj7B141jkGPW94DZOuc_g/550551/B1E30BE6C833B323DA036D09BB96F95D/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-26.gif>
